popupTerminate.content: Please note that this action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all current active unfulfilled orders and no new orders would be allowed on this project.
popupTerminate.footer: Please be certain of consequences terminating a project.

popupWithdraws.label: This project can be withdraw if:

popupDelete.label: This project can be deleted if:
content: 1. There is no transactions history associated to this project.
2. There are no open orders on the project.
3. There is no movement history associated to this project.
